channel.title: Free PS3 Conga - Currently cooper - giving free rs account ;)
channel.description:
EDIT: Note: To get started, register under cooper's link [ http://www.YourPS34free.com/index.php?ref=4988720]. On May 10th, someone will take his place, then the next referrer, and so on. Note: If you would like to "trade" for referrals, you can do so. I will give a free runescape account to the [b]6th[/b] referral I get from here. [quote="ThAt0n36Uy"]Well let me register then...
Just a quick overview of the registration process. You must give valid information to receive your prize. You can change your address after you register, so if you complete your referrals and want it shipped to a certain address you can do so. Or an address to which you have access too. There is a page you reach which asks you if you would like to be an ad completer, or referral completer. Choose the Referral one. And that's about it.[/quote]
Niall has given permission, as long as it does not get out of hand. Who will be going first?
I was wondering if anyone would like to participate in a ps3 gift conga. If you want to be sure I'm not attempting a scam just to get one for myself, I won't go first, and a respected member of the community could go first. Also, if this is against the rules, I will close it. It will use yourps34free.com [b][u]WHAT IS A CONGA?[/u][/b] A conga [line] is a way of getting referrals for free sites. The way it works is that the person who is currently going will have their referral ID posted in this message, and anyone who wants to participate in the conga signs up under them. They will stay up on top for a week, or until they get 10 referrals.
[b][u][u]IS THIS SITE A SCAM?[/u][/u][/b] I wasn't sure myself, but it has had a lot of good reviews. http://answers.yahoo.com/question/index?qid=20070625210722AArOw6R Homepage: http://www.trainn.org/sites.php [b][u]HOW MANY REFERRALS FOR WHAT?[/u][/b] Silver Bundle ( 2 Games of Choice) 14 referrals
Gold Bundle ( 1 game + extra controller) 13 referrals
Bronze Bundle ( 1 game of choice) 12 referrals
80 gig PS3 10 referral
60 gig PS3 10 referral
40 gig PS3 8 referrals
$350 cash 8 referrals [Note: This may be outdated] Hopefully we'll all be able to play GTA IV soon ;).

item.title: Free PS3 Conga - Currently cooper - giving free rs account ;)
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

ThAt0n36Uy:

You have to give credit card information, and I don’t have one. I even attempted that one, hoping that it might be an easy offer.

Neither do I. Hyperzosin appears to be free, as does overnight genius. Stamps.com, The Amazon Diet, and Video professor look free, but if you saw them not to be, they probably aren’t. I’ll try them when I have some free time. Anyways, what’s $5 for a free ps3?

lordbost:

[quote]3. To participate on our site, a user must reside and participate from within the United States or Canada. Accounts created or pursued from outside these locations will result in the accounts being closed and all credits forfeited.[/quote]

http://www.ps3.givafree.com/
That is world wide, if it is okay with anyone who is already registered, maybe we can switch. If not, maybe pay your friends a small amount of money for their referrals?

Read full topic

item.description:

Dude I’ll take the cash! Then I can buy a level 126 runescape account!

Nsh, I’ll try it, since I’m desperate for money right now.

EDIT: They’re asking for my address… This is obviously a scam where they send all this shit mail.

O yea i forgot they can send a ps3 through a wire to your email.
[/quote]

I meant I don’t want to give them my address right away. If I actually get the points to get my reward, then I’ll give it. I’ll give them a fake address.[/quote]
If you choose to do referral, don’t register yet.
Once I get permission from an admin, they [or who they pick] will go first, and then everyone will register under them.
However, if you do points, do whatever :P[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 27, 2008, 08:47:48 PM[/size][hr]Niall has given permission, as long as it does not get out of hand.
